title: Yosemite National Park
name: Taft Point
address: The trailhead is located at the Sentinel Dome/Taft Point trailhead parking area (6 mi / 9.6 km east of Bridalveil Creek Campground)
content: This relatively easy trail leads to the edge of Yosemite Valley. As the trail approaches Taft Point watch for fissures, which are deep cracks extending hundreds of feet downwards.  The railed-in Taft Point offers a breathtaking view of Yosemite Valley, 2,000 feet (600 m) below.
